idea-plugin.name: Recent Tabs ToolWindow
idea-plugin.description:
Adds a dedicated ToolWindow that displays a list of recently activated editor tabs. The list updates automatically as you switch between files.

  • Sorted by last activation (most recent on top)
  • Shows file names with full path tooltips
  • Opens files via single-click
  • Displays up to 50 recently accessed files
  • Fully compatible with WebStorm (no Java plugin dependency)

Ideal for developers who want a persistent, always-visible history of active files â€” independent of the built-in Recent Files popup.
